```{r code1, echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, tidy = TRUE}
#asp(asp = 1)
cloud1 <- list()
for(i in 1:100) {
  cloud1[[i]] <- rnorm(2)
}
plot(sapply(cloud1, function(x){x[[1]]}),sapply(cloud1, function(x){x[[2]]}), asp = TRUE)
```
